content:
Attachment II-B Audit Report No. A .- 1711
10. Some of the items, procured against PIO/Cs 484-99-471-5-00043 & 484-99-471-5-80450, have been in BES yard for over a year. On November 13, 1961, US AID/C advised CUS/. Third Division that these items may be disposed of in the manner suggested in their letter No. C3-61-2587 dated July 29, 1961. Recommendation was to sell at prices lower than the floor prices or sell as scrap. We requested that details of disposition be forwarded to US /.ID/C.
To date nothing has been done to dispose of the property. There are 52 items among which is the Crankshaft re-grinding machine stored outside of BES yard.

paragraphs.content: Attachment II-B Audit Report No. A .- 1711

10. Some of the items, procured against PIO/Cs 484-99-471-5-00043 & 484-99-471-5-80450, have been in BES yard for over a year. On November 13, 1961, US AID/C advised CUS/. Third Division that these items may be disposed of in the manner suggested in their letter No. C3-61-2587 dated July 29, 1961. Recommendation was to sell at prices lower than the floor prices or sell as scrap. We requested that details of disposition be forwarded to US /.ID/C.
To date nothing has been done to dispose of the property. There are 52 items among which is the Crankshaft re-grinding machine stored outside of BES yard.
